name: Down the Rabbit Hole (itch) (SasugaJoker, pupdad, RedNyanCat)
name_original: Down the Rabbit Hole (itch) (SasugaJoker, pupdad, RedNyanCat)
description:
A Foddian game made for Ludwig Jam about a bunny going through difficult levels.

Dodge bullets that might push you into holes and will make you lose a lot of progress. Solve puzzles and run to make your way to the top.

Desktop versions are available but only 16:9 aspect ratio is actually supported, please play the web version here if possible! MAC OS build is untested.

Credits:

SasugaJoker - Programming

RedNyanCat - Programming

Beckxstarz - Art

pupdad - Sound design/Music
